itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Goblin Cave, Ehwaz Hill, Balenos Forest, and Wolf Hills. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering Ash Trees.

item.name: Sharp Lumbering Axe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to help cut wood efficiently.\n- Gathering Time: - 4 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Lumbering Axe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to help cut wood efficiently.\n- Standard Gathering Time \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Sharp Pickaxe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for extracting ore and minerals from rock.\n- Gathering Time: - 4 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Pickaxe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for extracting ore and minerals from rock.\n- Standard Gathering Time \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Sharp Tanning Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect hide from dead animals.\n- Gathering Time: - 4 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Tanning Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect hide from dead animals.\n- Standard Gathering Time \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Sharp Butcher Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect meat from dead animals.\n- Gathering Time: - 4 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Butcher Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect meat from dead animals.\n- Standard Gathering Time \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Bronze Hoe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to harvest wild herbs and crops.\n- Gathering Time: - 4 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Hoe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to harvest wild herbs and crops.\n- Standard Gathering Time \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Ash Tree Float
item.desc: A float made of ash wood. Good for catching big fishes.\n\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Azwell Staff
item.desc: A staff custom-made for the commander of the Militia.

item.name: Ultimate Seleth Staff
item.desc:
A Seleth staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Seleth staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame, Seleth Staff of Destruction, Seleth Staff of Temptation, Seleth Staff

item.name: Ash Timber Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 10 planks of Ash Timber.

item.name: Seleth Staff of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Temptation, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Destruction, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame, Seleth Staff

item.name: Ultimate Demihuman Staff
item.desc:
A Demihuman staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Demihuman staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Demihuman Staff of Crimson Flame, Demihuman Staff of Destruction, Demihuman Staff of Temptation, Demihuman Staff

item.name: Demihuman Staff of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Demihuman Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Staff of Temptation, Demihuman Staff

item.name: Demihuman Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Demihuman Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Staff of Destruction, Demihuman Staff

item.name: Shabby Wagon Wheel
item.desc:
A wheel that can be installed on a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Shabby Wagon Flag
item.desc:
A flag for a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Demihuman Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Demihuman Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Staff of Crimson Flame, Demihuman Staff

item.name: Ultimate Azwell Staff
item.desc:
An Azwell staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Azwell staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Azwell Staff of Crimson Flame, Azwell Staff of Destruction, Azwell Staff of Temptation, Azwell Staff

item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Azwell Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Azwell Staff.

item.desc:

item.name: Balenos Fishing Rod
item.desc: Balenos fishing rod. It shortens the auto-fishing time.\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Fishing Rod
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for catching fish in rivers or oceans.

item.name: Golden Fishing Rod
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for catching fish in rivers or oceans. The chances of catching good fish are higher than with a regular fishing rod.\n\n- Item Effect: Fishing Speed +3 Levels

item.name: Steel Fishing Rod
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for catching fish in rivers or oceans. The chances of catching good fish are higher than with a regular fishing rod.\n\n- Item Effect: Fishing Speed +2 Levels

item.name: Thick Fishing Rod
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for catching fish in rivers or oceans. The chances of catching good fish are higher than with a regular fishing rod.\n\n- Item Effect: Fishing Speed +1 Level

item.name: Seleth Staff
item.desc: A staff possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Demihuman Staff
item.desc: A staff made for fighting threats to Humankind.

item.name: Azwell Longbow
item.desc: A longbow custom-made for the commander of the Militia.

item.name: Azwell Longbow of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Azwell Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Azwell Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Azwell Longbow of Temptation, Azwell Longbow

item.name: Azwell Longbow of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Azwell Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Azwell Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Azwell Longbow of Destruction, Azwell Longbow

item.name: Azwell Longbow of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Azwell Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Azwell Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Azwell Longbow of Crimson Flame, Azwell Longbow

item.name: Ultimate Azwell Longbow
item.desc:
An Azwell Longbow developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Azwell Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Azwell Longbow of Crimson Flame, Azwell Longbow of Destruction, Azwell Longbow of Temptation, Azwell Longbow

item.name: Ash Plywood
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Ash Timber. It requires Chopping: Beginner knowledge.

※ Find Lebyos in Heidel and complete the Working the Ash Tree Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Ash Plank
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Chopping Ash Timber.

item.name: Velian Handcrafted Chair
item.desc: A handcrafted chair from Velia.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200
